Package project.ss.engine

Interface Summary
ControledPlayer This interface adds output control to the basic interface Player.
CoreEngine This interface provides abstraction for production of synthesized speech for given IPA sequence.
Player This interface provides the abstraction for playing back of the audio.
 

Class Summary
ConcatenaterImpl This class provides the implementation of the Concatenater interface The class owns a AudioInputStream targeting the Voice File which contains audio data.The information related to the Voice File is stored in Voice Info File whose content is laoded in to the buffer for efficiency.
ControledPlayerImpl This class provides the implementation of both the basic Player interface and more capable ControlledPlayer interface.
CoreEngineImpl This interface provides the implementation of the interface CoreEngine.
FileConcatAudioPlayer  
IPAChars A utility class used to store the recognized IPA for the core engine
IPAToPartnemeTranslatorImpl This class implememts the IPAToPartnemeTranslation interface And use various methods to provide the translation.
SwingWorker This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
